author: Teh Dyzaster
comment: Doesn't allow you to make any changes via the watch face and it lacks the ability to be opened via the phone. Garbage app.
title: Horrible app

author: Quicksilver Sash
comment: I can't even open it up on the phone to put custom background on the watch

reply.author: G-CREATE
reply.content: This application will be installed in the watch face list of the Android Wear application. Like other applications, it will not be added to the home screen after installation. Also it will not be added to the app list in the drawer. Could you please check whether Custom Photo Watch is added in the watch face list of the Android Wear application?

author: Madelyn O'Shea
comment: Won't let me edit the photo or anything

author: Sheila R.
comment: You've done a terrific job with this - Better then Moto 360 stock customization app - you've added the bonus of Color Time and date AND font size!  Now even able to move time location so it doesn't block the pics. Keep up the great work - love the color/font options! I'm back😄! Now I've got My Pics, with My Color digital time and font in the Size I want; and date is just as customizable. Having Color options and size choice is a must when using custom photos -and stock only allows b/w which of course didn't work with all photos. With this Custom Watch Face app the digital clock can be tiny so as not ruin a back ground pic or enlarged and moved L/R, U/D. You're the best!

reply.author: G-CREATE
reply.content: Thank you for commenting! Now CustomPhotoWatch support 12/24 hour format in version 1.0.3. I hope this will be helpful to you :)

author: Kari Tonkin
comment: Works great on my LG G Watch. Simple, able to crop photos in Wear app, shows time and date. Great feature would be ability to create a gallery that cycles thru: each time watch turns on it's a new pic. Thumbs up!
title: Does what is says

author: Giovanni Chavez
comment: I chose the photo and never displays. I've added several images still does not work

reply.author: G-CREATE
reply.content: add another photo then select it. try it.

title: Does not work LG G WATCH

author: Joanne Wilson
comment: It uploads your pictures sideways and there's no option to rotate. Uninstalling.

reply.author: G-CREATE
reply.content: Added option to rotate images. Please try it.

title: Doesn't work properly.

reply.author: G-CREATE
reply.content: Added option to rotate images. Please try it.

author: Curtis Sinclair
comment: A really nice app you've created. Relatively easy to use. Would be great to see an option to automatically cycle through images at it given intervals. Excellent work though :-)
title: Great app!
